name: @iplocate/mcp-server
description: MCP server for IPLocate.io - IP address geolocation, network information, and threat detection

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive information about an IP address including all available data.

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_location
tools.description: Get geographic location information for an IP address.

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_privacy
tools.description: Check whether an IP address is a VPN, proxy, Tor exit node, or hosting provider.

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_network
tools.description: Get network and ASN (Autonomous System Number) information for an IP address.

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_company
tools.description: Get company/organization information for an IP address.

tools.name: lookup_ip_address_abuse_contacts
tools.description: Get abuse contact information for an IP address to report malicious activity.
